attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277357. WARRANTY 5 YEARS/200000KM. AA ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE 3 YEARS. The All-New BR-V design presents a dynamic body shape with strong contour lines that run along the body to accentuate the length of the new model. A design that is dominating, yet elegant. The front end has been redesigned to incorporate an aggressive, sporty new grille that seamlessly flows into the LED Daytime Running Lights and headlamps, giving the new model a confident appearance. One of the biggest aspects of the BR-V that everyone keeps talking about is the fact that the BR-V is a seven-seater SUV. The BR-V is genuinely spacious when it comes to comparing it with other cars of its category. The Honda BR-V can mainly be used as a family runabout and it is imperative that the crossover SUV has a good level of ride comfort.

attributes.description: ONE IN A MILLION. LOOKS FEELS AND DRIVES LIKE A BRAND NEW CAR. ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS, Perfectly original and immaculate in every way The car should be used as an advert by TOYOTA to explain how good the product actually is. GENUINE ONE OWNER VEHICLE It was bought new by a personal friend of ours who has used it mainly to do long distance mileage. Huge respect due for the fanatical way he has looked after his car HE HAS SERVICED IT WITH TOYOTA TWO TO THREE TIMES A YEAR. EVERY SERVICE RECORDED AND SERVICE BOOK STAMPED. THE CAR HAS NOT SKIPPED A BEAT IN TERMS ON MAINTENANCE. If looked after and maintained like this one has been then these cars can do well over R1 million KMS Extras include Chrome Nudge bar, side steps, step tow bar and THULE roof racks 4 GOODYEAR ALL TERREIN TYRES ARE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION If you are looking to buy a similar car in this price range then you owe it to yourself to at least drive this one before making a decision Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
